remarks: The concatenation of two path-homotopy classes in the fundamental group.  (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 11-Jun-2010.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 10-Jul-2015.)
statement:
elpi1.g $e |- G = ( J pi1 Y ) $.
elpi1.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
elpi1.1 $e |- ( ph -> J e. ( TopOn ` X ) ) $.
elpi1.2 $e |- ( ph -> Y e. X ) $.
pi1addf.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) $.
pi1addval.3 $e |- ( ph -> M e. U. B ) $.
pi1addval.4 $e |- ( ph -> N e. U. B ) $.
pi1addval $p |- ( ph -> ( [ M ] ( ~=ph ` J ) .+ [ N ] ( ~=ph ` J ) ) = [ ( M ( *p ` J ) N ) ] ( ~=ph ` J ) ) $.
